author: Jill Serjeant
title: Who's Who of pop culture unites for 'One World' coronavirus special for front-line workers - The Globe and Mail
description:
1. Who's Who of pop culture unites for 'One World' coronavirus special for front-line workers  The Globe and Mail
  2. Pop culture stars unite for 'One World' coronavirus TV special  Canoe
  3. The Rolling Stones join star-studded lineup for Co…
content:
Lady Gaga, Taylor Swift, Paul McCartney, The Rolling Stones, Beyonce and Oprah Winfrey on Saturday headlined a special broadcast of music, comedy and personal stories celebrating those around the world on the frontlines of the coronavirus pandemic.
